title: Script font in Shu Uemura email
content:
Hi, can anybody tell me what the name of this script-ish font is? It was in a shu uemura email. Sorry, a bit obtuse of a description, but that's the only place I've seen it. If a similar font can be recommended, please let me know too!

Thanks!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [script-sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212014/http:/typophile.com/files/script-sample.jpg) | 29.91 KB |
author: lyra1227

comments.content:
It's Letraset's [Goo-goo-gjoob](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212014/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/goo-goo-gjoob/), supposedly a recreation of John Lennon's handwriting.

- Mike Yanega
